parametrized_description: A magic school sends letters to students using carrier pigeons and owls. Each carrier pigeon can carry PigeonLetterCapacity letters per trip and requires PigeonTreatCost treats for service. Each owl can carry OwlLetterCapacity letters per trip and requires OwlTreatCost treats for service. At most MaxOwlProportion of the total birds can be owls. The school has TotalTreats treats available. At least MinPigeons carrier pigeons must be used. The goal is to determine the number of carrier pigeons and owls to maximize the total number of letters sent.

PigeonLetterCapacity.description: The number of letters a carrier pigeon can carry at a time

PigeonTreatCost.description: The number of treats required for a carrier pigeon's service

OwlLetterCapacity.description: The number of letters an owl can carry at a time

OwlTreatCost.description: The number of treats required for an owl's service

MaxOwlProportion.description: The maximum proportion of birds that can be owls

TotalTreats.description: The total number of treats available

MinPigeons.description: The minimum number of carrier pigeons that must be used

NumPigeons.description: The number of carrier pigeons used

constraints.description: The total number of treats required for carrier pigeons and owls must not exceed TotalTreats.
The number of owls used must be at most MaxOwlProportion of the total number of birds.
At least MinPigeons carrier pigeons must be used.

objective.description: Maximize the total number of letters sent, which is the sum of letters carried by carrier pigeons and owls.
